title: Design review: 1-1 chats (chat view)
body:
- [ ] 1. Long names are not handled - comment [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS?node-id=3678:7819&mode=design#510047182)  
- [ ] 2. Top margin is wrong when a message is selected - comment [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS?node-id=3678:7819&mode=design#510223499)  
- [ ] 3. Line should be expanded in context drawer when message is selected   - comment [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS?node-id=3678:7819&mode=design#510226735)  
- [ ] 4.  User avatar is bigger than in designs - comment [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS?node-id=3678:7819&mode=design#511406255) 
- [ ] 5. Misaligned contact icon - comment [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS?node-id=3678:7819&mode=design#511405186)  
- [ ] 6. Wrong color of the circle around the online status dot - comment [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS/Feedback-for-Mobile?type=design&node-id=3817-74882&mode=design&t=7oGIJsujWlrIaN19-4)
- [ ] 7. Background of the back button is not visible - comment [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS/Feedback-for-Mobile?type=design&node-id=3817-74882&mode=design&t=7oGIJsujWlrIaN19-4)
- [ ] 8. Emojis icon is bigger than in design - comment [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS?node-id=3678:7819&mode=design#511397756)
- [ ] 9. Add emojis icon color is not aligned - comment [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS?node-id=3678:7819&mode=design#511397930)
- [ ] 10. Name in reply message is too small - comment [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS?node-id=3678:7819&mode=design#511398626)
